mapper.sql: id, owner, source, customer_id, full_name, appellation, email, cell_phone, job, birth, create_by, create_time, edit_by, edit_time, description, contact_summary, next_contact_time, address

tc1.id,tu1.name as owner,tdv2.value as source,tc2.name as customer_id,tc1.full_name,tdv1.value as appellation, tc1.email,tc1.cell_phone,tc1.job,tc1.birth,tu2.name as create_by,tc1.create_time,tu3.name as edit_by, tu1.edit_time,tc1.description,tc1.contact_summary,tc1.next_contact_time,tc1.address

from tbl_contacts as tc1 join tbl_user as tu1 on tc1.owner = tu1.id left join tbl_dic_value as tdv2 on tc1.source = tdv2.id left join tbl_customer as tc2 on tc1.customer_id = tc2.id left join tbl_dic_value as tdv1 on tc1.appellation = tdv1.id join tbl_user as tu2 on tc1.create_by = tu2.id left join tbl_user as tu3 on tc1.edit_by = tu3.id
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_contacts (id, owner, source, customer_id, full_name, appellation, email, cell_phone, job, birth, create_by, create_time, edit_by, edit_time, description, contact_summary, next_contact_time, address ) values (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{owner,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appellation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cellPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{job,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birth,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{editBy,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{editTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nextContactTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

update tbl_contacts
owner = #{owner,jdbcType=CHAR},
source = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=CHAR},
full_name = #{fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
appellation = #{appellation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cell_phone = #{cellPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
job = #{job,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contact_summary = #{contactSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
next_contact_time = #{nextContactTime,jdbcType=CHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
